ygData.subject: Re: The real thruth!
ygData.msgSnippet: I talked to a GM tonight. He is a GM, a game master, that means that he works AT Verant, and gets payed for being a guide, and, he IS told stuff about what
ygData.messageBody:
I talked to a GM tonight. He is a GM, a game master, that means that he
works AT Verant, and gets payed for being a guide, and, he IS told stuff
about what happens in the game. He is a very trustworthy GM too.
One time, when I asked him about something, he said he could answer me,
because he didn't know the full truth on it, and didn't want to start a
bunch of rmors about it, so he doesn't say something unless it's confirmed.
He told me that tinkering WAS broken. I asked him what broken meant and he
said there there was one tinkering book missing and some of the combinations
that should work don't. I asked him if the third book would be hidden or
not, and he said, that he didn't know. Also, he said that it will be put in
the patch info when tinkering is fixed, so we will know. I also asked him if
they will be working more on tinkering, and he said quite possibly so.

There you have it. The truth. The REAL truth. I blelive this GM is to be
trusted. He dosn't lie, and he knew what he was talking about right away.
We'll just have to wait till we see that they've fixed it till we look any
further.

Sniffledoo.
